metas.name: Kimi to Idol Precure♪ (Movie) (Provisional Title)
metas.description:
Genres: Mahou Shoujo Tags:Idol/Primarily Female Cast/Magic/Henshin/Kids Movie of Kimi to Idol Precure♪, initially revealed at theatrical screenings of Wonderful Precure! The Movie! Dokidoki♡Game no Sekai de Daibouken!.

Note: Title and relations are provisional and will be updated when more info is announced.
